title: THORChain Soars 8% as DeFi Exchange Lifts Trading Pause
description: THORChain's leading exchange also updated its terms of service, introducing new blocks on countries sanctioned by the United States.

title: French regulator calls out DeFi centralization as AWS gains 4% in ETH node market share
description:
France’s banking and insurance regulator, the Autorité de contrôle prudentiel et de résolution (ACPR), has published a summary of its findings from a public consultation on regulating decentralized finance (DeFi.) The consultation received significant engagement from global DeFi stakeholders, providing valuable insights to inform potential regulatory approaches in Europe. According to the ACPR, the two-month […]

The post French regulator calls out DeFi centralization as AWS gains 4% in ETH node market share appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Analyst Jason Pizzino Forewarns of Severe Impact on Altcoins if Bitcoin Dips Below Key Levels
description: Crypto analyst Jason Pizzino has issued a cautionary note to investors in alternative cryptocurrencies (altcoins), emphasizing that the future of these digital assets is closely tied to Bitcoin’s performance. In a YouTube video (titled “Caution: Bitcoin & SP500 Diverging, Crypto Verging on Collapse”) released on October 11, Pizzino informed his audience of 290K subscribers that […]

title: Crypto rallies while Israel readies its offensive
description: As Israel warns Palestinians in the north of Gaza to move south and away from its impending offensive, crypto is acting as a contrary asset and is finally seeing a small bounce after several days of downward price action.

title: River Report: Bitcoin’s Lightning Network Grew by 1,212% in 2 Years
description: A recent report published by River, a Bitcoin technology and financial services company, has revealed that the Lightning Network, a scaling layer for Bitcoin, has grown by 1,212% in two years. River’s estimation comes from examining operators of nodes comprising 52% of the public capacity on the network, concluding that it has “become much more […]

title: Breaking Chains: Tezos’s Perspective on True Blockchain Evolution
description: The crypto industry has seen an unparalleled shift in recent years, with various blockchains making significant strides. One that remains distinctly relevant despite its age is Tezos. In an exclusive interview with its co-founder, Arthur Breitman, I got him and other important team members to dig into the very fabric of what makes Tezos a ... Read more

title: Identity of FTX hacker remains a mystery as stolen assets shift again
description: FTX Exchange, the target of a high-profile hacking incident in November 2022, has once again come under the spotlight as the anonymous hackers behind the attack have resumed their activities. Blockchain analytics firm Elliptic reported that a substantial portion of the stolen assets, totaling 72,500 Ether (ETH), has been on the move since the beginning ... Read more

title: PBOC emphasizes security in China’s digital finance evolution
description: China’s central bank, the People’s Bank of China (PBOC), is spearheading the nation’s evolution into digital finance, emphasizing the importance of security, cost-efficiency, and misuse prevention. Zhou Xiaochuan, the bank’s former governor, recently shared his insights at a Beijing forum, clearly showing the nation’s trajectory in the world of central bank digital currencies (CBDCs). Zhou ... Read more

title: NOWNodes Elevates Shiba Inu’s Shibarium with 0xShibarium AI Integration
description: NOWNodes announces partnership with 0xShibarium AI, aiming to refine Shibarium Layer 2 blockchain functions. title: XRP Army Unhappy as US Gov Mentions Ripple in Terror Financing Context
description:
The crypto community has recently scrutinized the U.S. government’s allegedly prejudicial view of various crypto-based projects being used to fund terrorism. In a recent tweet, XRP enthusiast wEeZiE raised concerns regarding the U.S. Department of State’s mention of Ripple in their statement on cryptocurrency and its potential use by criminals. The post XRP Army Unhappy as US Gov Mentions Ripple in Terror Financing Context appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: New Gaming Altcoin Skyrockets Over 267% After Listings on Crypto Exchanges Binance and Coinbase
description:
A brand-new gaming altcoin has ripped by more than 267% this week after listings on multiple top crypto exchanges. Big Time (BIGTIME) is a free-to-play multiplayer action RPG game that launched its preseason on Tuesday after years of development. The BIGTIME token, which powers Big Time’s economy, also debuted this week, soaring from around $0.0709 […]
